description:
Upcoming weather events & Orwellian agendas & motives to be vigilant of & prepare for. •

This is not fear-mongering, it’s being realistic & vigilant, knowing that what we have already endured will continue happening, because people simply don’t get it that these are orchestrated events. •

So many are ensnared in the matrix mind-control hypnosis programming and have no clue how to connect all the dots, & can benefit from being pointed in the right direction as far as what to research & find the gnosis for themselves. •

What are solutions? There are many, but the first one is to have COURAGE, to speak your truth & not be afraid of being mocked for stating the truth of the direction our planet is heading. •

We can redeem our income in lawful money so we aren’t endorsing the (non-federal, private corpseoration) fed reserve, we can file notices of liability with our city councils on 5G and any other sort of tyrannical unconstitutional law or ordinance they approve. •

We can take steps every day to become more self-sufficient, & we can not fund corpseorations like big pharma & Agra that are polluting the environment, toxifying the human condition & causing suffering for millions of sentient beings. •

We can talk to our neighbors & hand out informational flyers on 5G, vaccine ingredients, inflated death statistics of the scamdemic, etc. •

We can work on becoming better people, we can live righteously & virtuously and not violate Natural Law & the property rights of other sentient beings. We can wear the full armor of God & shine the light of truth on all wickedness & deception. •

Now, let’s get into these topics we face. 
Agenda 21/2030, technocracy, mandatory vaccines, collectivism, transhumanism, artificial intelligence, 5g,  climate change hoax, weather warfare & Covid scamdemics:

The agendas that make up the road to the centralized one world government, aka the new world odor. •

Similar & interrelated motives & psychological operations that are all in motion at once, with the goal of restricting basic rights, liberties & freedoms, body autonomy, resources, energy usage, rights to travel, assemble & bear arms... Cont’d 👇🏽
